fields.name: Thread the Needle (Passive):
fields.value: If you target someone who placed immediately below or above you last evening, your attack power will double for that attack.

fields.name: Perforate:
fields.value: Attack someone with your attack power.

fields.name: Backstitch (1x):
fields.value: Attack a target using your attack score from the previous round rather than this oneâ€™s. No boosts or penalties applied to you will change this attack score.

fields.name: Back Together (1x, Locked):
fields.value: Unlocked if you have successfully killed four players. Target a player you have killed to revive them.
